website_summaries.verdict: Though the antenna could be more durable, this is a top model that works as promised, even at a distance.
pros: A reliable remote starter and security system by a trusted company in automotive technology
Stands out for its 1-mile starting range and vivid, easy-to-see screen
cons: The antenna on this model is delicate and breaks too easily

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: By the time you find someone to install this product and have for a few days you will find your self with a defective alarm system and no refund. The company is taking no responsibility for the bad product they are selling.
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!!! This seller ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product!!! This seller is not certified. The product comes with lifetime warranty card but company VIPER does not cover warranty because seller is not certified. You will loose your money once you have any technical issue with product. After 6 month later, i am having issue with remote starter battery. Battery does not stay charge long enough so i have contacted Viper and they said that we can not replace the product because seller is not certified. I gave them warranty information and proof of purchase but Viper denied.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Patel

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY! Stay away, NO WARRANTY from AMAZOM.COM
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY this alarm if you want to install it yourself. The installation instructions are so difficult to understand and poor/basic. No youtube video or manual hat will guide you step by step. I installed it by 2 alarm car professionals, it worked for a couple of days and then it didnt turn on again, VIPER WILL NOT RESPOND TO ANY WARRANTY under this intallation method without an authorize dealer, so dont by throught amazon.com. I lost my money and noobody responds to me.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great product! But what else do you expect from Viper?
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Makes people jealous wherever I go. I’ve had a lot of experience installing remote starts and security systems, specifically Vipers. They are the best product on the market, hands down. That said, I thought they couldn’t be purchased outside of a retail dealer/installer? The battery life on this new remote is amazing. I’ve has this for several months and use it at least twice daily and have not had to recharge since the first time! My other vehicle has an older version of this exact remote and it must be recharged weekly. It’s been that way since installed new. So great job Viper for drastically improving the quality, battery life and remote transmitting distance! Love Viper!
customer_reviews.author: BlackGoldDoc

customer_reviews.title: Brand new
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and new. Just as described. It is important to note for future customers that Viper systems can be hard to find someone who will install them, unless you know how to do it yourself. Many shops won't touch them because they are pretty unique apparently. Only one shop in town would install it and it cost quite a bit more than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Long distance start!
customer_reviews.text: Love this remote start. The main key fob has a screen that allows you to see if your car is locked or not. Plus, it starts from up to a mile away! I can start it from abou 1 block away inside a building from an interior room with no windows. Love it in hot and cold weather. Just make sure you adjust your heating/cooling settings to the level you want them to be when you return to you return to your car. It shuts down after 12 minutes if the key is not inserted and turned, which I like; no chance of running all day!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: you better know what your doing
customer_reviews.text: i am an avid mechanic and this took me about 8-9 hours to install. very very limited instructions. some features took a while to understand and get working. other then that it works great. shock senor works great and key fob have a super long battery life. i use it daily and i still have 3 out of 4 bars of battery after a month. if you know what your doing this still can be challenging but its worth the time. I am not 100% sure if this is actually a viper system or a knock off because i am not an expert with car alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler V.

customer_reviews.title: Highly configurable. Great value. A lot of work to install.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great security system. I am only using maybe 50% of its features but I'll slowly connect more as I have time. I installed it myself with the help of the wiring diagrams for my vehicle, the install "manual" and the12volt.com. it took me about 24 man-hours to install as an amateur. I wouldn't recommend a self install for most people. The remote range isn't one mile (maybe line of sight on a clear day) but its much further then any other remote I have ever used. The whole system is amazingly configurable. I love the aux outputs and 2 way remote. Over all a 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate setup for the perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: It Installed perfectly in my 03 Yukon Denali. Product came new just like it would from the store and comes with all the essentials to protect your investment. Instructions were useful for the essentials. Online manual is more detailed and descriptive. This system is not intended for your regular joe to install. Must have some electrical knowledge to install. Professional install is highly recommended. Most vehicles will also require a bypass module which is sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Berube

customer_reviews.title: The best remote start, keyless, alarm system I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this unit. The range is super long, I can start my vehicle from inside stores and the 2-way display tells me that it started successfully, no guesswork.
customer_reviews.author: alloro

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with neutral safety ON/OFF switch
customer_reviews.text: This remote start is great. For the most part the units are very solid. DOES NOT COME WITH WARRANTY! I used to be a dealer and installer of viper products. Some guys will charge an extra $50 to $100 to install since you bought this through amazon. You can tell it’s not a dealer unit because the ON/OFF (AKA neutral safety) port is blocked off and it does not come with the ON/OFF switch itself. You need to buy a separate switch and wire it between neutral safety (Black/White) wire and the ground (Black) wire. This is my only complaint. WARNING: Pictures are deceiving because this unit has a blocked off port and no ON/OFF switch.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!! Not functional product.
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. It took me a while to install it, now I’m out the money with this garbage. After further investigation, it seems it was a counterfeit item, with a missing toggle switch port on the board.
customer_reviews.author: COMPUGOD

customer_reviews.title: Great System for Remote Start & More!
customer_reviews.text: Added this to my Equus & I love it. Decided to cut the yearly subscription to remote start the car from my cell phone. This does the job and has a Mile long range, does the trick for the hots days of the summer and I’m sure will be spot on for the winter in cold days & nights.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzock

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: System is a nightmare to install if you dont have a vehicle manual or if a previous system was installed. Other than that, it works amazing with a pretty impressive range. Comes with a primary lcd screen remote and a secondary valet remote. Changing settings is easy but noisy(siren chirps to navigate menus).
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: I love this alarm but customer service from DEI is horrid ...
customer_reviews.text: After numerous Google searches I have gotten this installed on my 04 Avalanche, I love this alarm but customer service from DEI is horrid (I am not an installer) DEI has a great product just poor customer service (if you are not an installer). To bad they forgot about the end user who keeps them in business.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice alarm. Not 1 mile radius
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice alarm! However, the remote range is nowhere near 1 mile. More like 1/8 or 1/4 mile range.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: amazing product and seller! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product , worked perfectly and the seller was great with keeping in contact and answering my questions. Would buy again Alarm has been installed for 3 weeks now and is working like a charm, such a fun toy
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Alarm sucks and viper customer service never return my phone calls or emails
customer_reviews.text: No my viper alarm did not meet my expectations it’s a pain in the butt it works sometimes and it dosent , with professional installation
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D.

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions aren’t that clear. Had to actually find wiring instructions on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Order 2 of these new and both time got used or refurbished save your money and go to best buy and get newer version for lile 100 bucks more and tjey gave u free installation
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. The downside was that for one of the 2 remote that was giving. LCD remote is 2 way, However the SECOND remote is one 1 way.... but other then that it was great
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I love this system. Does everything I wanted in security and the remote start is great. With a new baby we didn't want to enter a hot car, with the remote start the cars cool by the time we enter it. With the one mile range I'm notified if anything happens while I'm gone. Installed it myself took a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you get it installed by a knowledgable shop
customer_reviews.author: Cashman1501

customer_reviews.title: low price, high quality
customer_reviews.text: paid a pro to install it. not recommended for home installer or hobbyist
customer_reviews.author: sean molloy

customer_reviews.title: Got the package went to have it installed a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the package went to have it installed a week and a half to two weeks later notice there was missing parts the harness to the shock sensor was missing but other than that works fine
customer_reviews.author: David simonson

customer_reviews.title: A great price and quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: A kick ass alarm and remote starter . A great price and quick shipping . Love it how the remote tells me if something is going on with my car and the timer has a count down to when the car will turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I will say this is the second time I've bought from this. And everytime has been flawless. Will definitely keep buying to install with my other vehicles. I was kinda sad the price went from 240 with some change to 300 but overall the product is great 👍 👌
customer_reviews.author: Marcus H.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper through Amazon. Product came as listed. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper through Amazon. Product came as listed. I had it installed on my car and has been working perfectly. One thing that can be improved upon is that the buttons on the side of the remote are soft and if you have to press on it hard to activate. I can imagine the buttons tearing at some point because of the material used to make it.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: Had it professionally installed at geek squad, showed us how to use. My daughter loves the security.
customer_reviews.author: Coonie63

customer_reviews.title: use and duravility
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was not installed well or I have a defective product but the range on this alarm is as poor as the old one I used to have in truck, I replaced it to get more range but I just wasted my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: this was a great buy. may get another for my truck one ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this a day early. thank you. I have had this sys before and that is why I bought this one. when I opened the shipping box it was the factory box and everything was there. this was a great buy.may get another for my truck one day.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Molitor

customer_reviews.title: This is the second Viper I've purchased. I had ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Viper I've purchased. I had to buy a new one after I traded in my old car for a newer model. I have always trusted the quality of Viper, and I never have to wonder if I remembered to lock my car because of the built in screen.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Lui

customer_reviews.title: I love my viper alarm
customer_reviews.text: I love my viper alarm!!! The only thing is I don't think the full mile range actually works. I've changed positions of my vehicle and tried to do it in a straight line and it didn't start from a mile away
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: No instructions and viper is so anal with the instructions ...
customer_reviews.text: No instructions and viper is so anal with the instructions they won't give them out unless ur certified viper installer
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Best alarm on the market for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Polite Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my viper remote start. Living in AZ, this is a purchase well worth the money. I would recommend this to anyone who lives her in the terrible heat or anyone in severely cold weather as you can warm up your vehicle while you're in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Gomez

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Viper/DEI products are some of the best on the market. I use them in every competition vehicle I have built and recommend them to anyone looking for a remote start, or alarm. I purchased this for a friend. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davidoski

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I will never regret this purchase! If you're serious about your car and the safety of your car. This is the system to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doku Yang

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Not my first install. But was fairly easy. One thing I didn't like was they didnt ask for my type of vehicle. ( last alarm I bought 5 years ago from ebay I told them what vehicle I had and they printed me a sheet with wire colors and locations)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great security system for any vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Great security system for any vehicle. It has so many additional attachments you can add it is an amazing system.
customer_reviews.author: A just

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Alarm seems fine for the money. The range is over stated, but the remote start is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: David Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Viper quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you want! There is none better!
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2 years later the display remote shows a blank screen
customer_reviews.author: edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great product, professional install required
customer_reviews.text: Everything is in the box as it should be and works like it’s supposed to, professional install required
customer_reviews.author: D-Money

customer_reviews.title: Amazing alarm. Needed a bypass but that all depends ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing alarm. Needed a bypass but that all depends on your car. The best thing about it, the remote is rechargeable!!
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Best alarm system
customer_reviews.text: Best alarm system. Love it, specially went I start my truck from my office. By the time I get there is cold in the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Distance is great.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install on my 09 Buick enclave. Especially since I had another remote start already installed that quit working. Used with a xpresskit module. Only issue is that I haven't figured out how to make the priority door work yet. They all unlock with a single press, but I haven't spent very much time messing with it. I know that it is just a programming issue. I love the distance out of this compared to any other system that I have owned. I haven't tested the distance, but it has worked every time that I have tried. I've been in the back of a local department store and parked in the back of the lot.
customer_reviews.author: btravis

customer_reviews.title: Good system but poor customer support.
customer_reviews.text: System works good but key fobs are cheap...had mine installed two weeks ago and the fob has a big black dot on it on the LCD screen. Called their customer service phone number and had to punch in 4 different numbers to get to customer service...when I finally did was placed on hold with the same recording for 30 minutes...finally hung up. This is the second system I have purchased for my vehicles, trust me, by it from Best Buy and get the extended warranty as you will get no support from Vipers customer service.
customer_reviews.author: JOE D

customer_reviews.title: Great discount
customer_reviews.text: Yes very satisfied with this product. First off I saved over 500 dollars shopping on amazon compared going to the manufacturer. I definitely got it installed by a professional for 150 because it seemed to complicated to do myself. Thanks amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio contreras

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and had a best but tech install for me! Great for my 2001 chevy silverado
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: OK.
customer_reviews.text: Have had issues with the relays / module doing odd things. Ended up having to buy another kit. It does provide a long range to signal
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As with all DEI products I've tried, this one works perfectly. Remote battery life is exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Damnyankee36

customer_reviews.title: Great system, arrived on time with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Great system, arrived on time with no problems. Had to find an installer which wasn't too difficult in my area. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: James Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Got product for bargain price, fast delivery got everything I needed in one box as well. (accessories)
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: ready for this
customer_reviews.text: one of the reasons I like this product is that you can be three stories up and behind it was filled with concrete and rebar and be the only guy on the floor to be able to start your vehicle from inside of a NOC or MDP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beware B-Stock!
customer_reviews.text: 1st one did not work, but they did replace remote, although it took several months to straighten out.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L. Southworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no issues. Nice light installed with this so people know there's an alarm on my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This device is very convenient for me. I can ...
customer_reviews.text: This device is very convenient for me. I can start the car with the push of a button and not have to wait for it to warm up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! I installed it on a 2009 Altima. And it works great. No problems with it at all. Had it on for a week. It was professionally installed in about an hour. Recommend this product for anyone looking for a remote starter. ***keep in mind, this product does not include the bypass module*** i had to purchase it seperate in the store which came out to $80. So if you can find out which bypass module is compatable to your vehicle and remote starter you can purchase it on amazon for cheaper. And when you want it to get installed professionally they will only charge you for installations. GOOD LUCK.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: Error
customer_reviews.text: The auto start function has stoped working, can you provide me with any kind of warranty ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great alarm and great price. FYI buy the installation package on here its cheaper cost me 300 bucks to get installed with life time warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: I have 4 cars and each of the car i ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cars and each of the car i have viper alarms on them so yes viper is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: herbie

customer_reviews.title: Viper is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This Viper security system is my favorite one, they have updated the alarm so you can wire up N/C triggers without having to do resistors and a lot of extra wiring, super reliable, and easy to read instruction manual. Even comes with a USB wire to charge the remote, very cool. Works really well for manual cars too, you just got to get used to the sequence before you get out of the car, its a good thing though, it makes it so you won't leave it in gear, no one needs to run anyone over or wreck the front end of your car. Love these security systems.
customer_reviews.author: jesse r

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit. It is worth the price for sure. It has a really good range and the interior temperature sensor that displays on your LCD screen is a really nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This viper alarm is the best money I ever spend I will recommend this 👍
customer_reviews.author: jose g.

customer_reviews.title: Small fob that doesn't feel like you're carrying a sock full of quarters and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas 2014 and she loves it. Works from quite a distance although we never tried to reach its limits. Shock sensor works...so I found out after filling her windshield fluid and dropping the hood, lol. Not sure how the system armed itself but hey, it works! Small fob that doesn't feel like you're carrying a sock full of quarters and it would be very difficult to accidentally start the vehicle. If you have fingers like sausages, you may have a little trouble as the start button is small and on the side of the fob.
customer_reviews.author: MadMaxx

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Bought it for my partner as a birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Bought it for my partner as a birthday gift and he is beyond satisfied. The guy who installed it at our garage was totally blown away by the product and its capabilities as well.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H

customer_reviews.title: This alarm is awesome, if you live in a colder climate
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is awesome, if you live in a colder climate, you would love it in the winter because just hit a button 10 minutes before you come out to the car, and it will be all warm when you get in the car. The range of the two way remote is the best of the best, this the top of the line system you can get for your car. Very high quality stuff here.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Love coming out to a warm car in cold weather ...
customer_reviews.text: Love coming out to a warm car in cold weather and a cool car in warm weather! Also like the automatic kill switch if someone breaks in while it's running. Would be nice if the remote lit up.
customer_reviews.author: darryl  may

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install and works great! I almost wish I had a mini van with all the extra options this alarm comes with. So many of them! Once installed it's pretty simple to setup the alarm. Make sure you pair your alarm fobs and read any instructions on setting up other products used in conjunction with the install. Pay close attention to wire polarities, they change from (-) to (+) throughout the installation and some may require a relay. Installed on my '08 Dodge Ram 1500 Quad Cab, along with a DEI Bypass module and wiring harness.
customer_reviews.author: Reyes T Duran Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: The product has defects it's always lagging i turn on my car with it and the alarm goes off and my unlock button shows that its unlock while the car stays locked will not recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Rinaldi Caba

customer_reviews.title: The business that I had install the system told me it looked like it was taken out of the box and tossed ...
customer_reviews.text: The remote start and alarm system works as it's supposed to but the indicator light that's mounted on the windshield that lets people see that there's an alarm on your car doesn't work. The business that I had install the system told me it looked like it was taken out of the box and tossed back in carelessly. I didn't even open the box the product came in before going to have it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Blarg

customer_reviews.title: totally awesome!
customer_reviews.text: it is a great product, and the seller always was in contact for any question.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Foxx

customer_reviews.title: super low price....
customer_reviews.text: One of the best buys I've ever purchased... If you love your vehicle like I do then protect your investment!

customer_reviews.title: Best alarms hands down
customer_reviews.text: Been installing viper alarms since the 80's. Best alarms hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Alarm system install price was grossly inaccurate. Amazon charged ...
customer_reviews.text: Alarm system install price was grossly inaccurate. Amazon charged me for the install which was $100. This was an estimated price and I was ok paying maybe up to $200 for the install. I was called by the install technician and told that it would not cost $100 (as Amazon said) but rather $500 to $800 and as a result I am returning the purchase. This is clearly Bait and Switch and I am reporting this to my lawyer.
customer_reviews.author: Ballard Place Condominiums

customer_reviews.title: pager faulty!
customer_reviews.text: The alarm is a great with kool features. Its definitely a best buy for security for your vehicle. Why I give it three stars, my pager only worked a day and began to malfunction. I got it checked by a certified viper specialist, the results the pager is faulty. I looked at purchasing a new pager but find the price way heavy for just a pager. Need one but I'll decide a bit later hoping the price drop ah bit.
customer_reviews.author: chump

customer_reviews.title: works good. i feel safer with it now
customer_reviews.text: works good. i feel safer with it now. It should have better instructions for those who install it by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: ... start works well and remote range is also very good. Very pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Remote start works well and remote range is also very good. Very pleased with this buy
customer_reviews.author: Shane King

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back Here is a photo if it it dose not look like the on line
customer_reviews.text: The unit dose not have a Plug Play on the side for the on and off swith ???????!!!!!!!. Sent it back .Here is a photo it dose not look like the Photo on this site. some one need`s to check to see the unit in the box is want it is if not do not send it out.
customer_reviews.author: Daffy

customer_reviews.title: ... been in for two days now and it works great. Installers who but it in also raved about ...
customer_reviews.text: Its been in for two days now and it works great. Installers who but it in also raved about this product. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Foster

customer_reviews.title: works great but not one mile.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this item myself. Used to work at circuit city as an installer. This alarm is great once you get it to work. Viper is now trying to be funny with the installation instructions but good thing I have done many of them before. I would recommend this item but if you have never installed an alarm before I would recommend you have a professional do it. As for one mile, I work in construction now. I parked on the highway and went about half mile with one small hill and had trouble getting signal. Now if you park where you have line of sight with no power wires or anything near by, yes one mile.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Unit works fine. The main power wires are slightly thinner than usual but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Arrevillaga

customer_reviews.title: Love this on my 95 honda civic
customer_reviews.text: Love this on my 95 honda civic. Got it installed at best buy and works better then i thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Jadarrian E.

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm but....
customer_reviews.text: Awesome alarm but the lack of installation instructions and lack of programming material available is annoying. Also don't like the fact that warranty is void if not installed by a licensed viper installer. Great features. Remote range isn't as far as expected, even after reading reviews, but it's still pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: J.t.

customer_reviews.title: Black Box Overheated
customer_reviews.text: Took hours to install in a 2017 Subaru Forester and once installed the black box became hot and no longer works, I have tried to contact the company with no response. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa

customer_reviews.title: Recommend you look at getting one of the others like ...
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to install and find information on. Recommend you look at getting one of the others like Clifford or. Viper which has better instructions for the home tinkerer.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great alarm system
customer_reviews.text: Great alarm system! I've been using it for a while and it hasn't given me any trouble. If any improvement could be made to this system it would be the range on the remotes to the receiver on the car. Also great for heating up your car in cold or winter weather conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the unit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the unit. Only thing is when I'm inside my job it takes two or three pushes to get it going. I love it though.

customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: The system is awesome and works for supposedly up to a mile
customer_reviews.text: The system is awesome and works for supposedly up to a mile. I have started it from about half a mile away, as long as there are not too many obstacles in the way (bldgs, etc). My only issue is that I have had issues with the battery keeping a charge after having it for about 6 months so it beeps all the time for a low battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jourdan

customer_reviews.text: I'm recommending this for everyone was need buy something the best quality!!!! I'm very happyyyyyy

customer_reviews.title: Im seriously pissed at how poor it is
customer_reviews.text: So I have 3 cars with these. I cant get the thing to start unless im by a window in a building. Im seriously pissed at how poor it is. Other then that its works and makes noises when It goes off. I wanted it for the autostart distance. I want to know where they tested this at 1 mile..........the desert with nothing blocking the line of sight????

product_meta.title: Viper 5706V 2-Way Car Security with Remote Start System
product_meta.description: The Viper 5706v Responder LC3 is a complete security and remote start system with a full one mile range. The remote has easy to understand priority icons and a text screen on a LCD display. This allows you to command and monitor the vehicle with simple and prioritized buttons. The five buttons control up to 24 different functions on two cars! Plus, it is the slimmest display remote on the market today but still packed with the latest features. Not only is this a security system but it also has remote start capabilities. If the Active Temp Check is selected, the Responder will display the temperature inside of the vehicle instead of the time. This comes in handy as it lets you view the temperature before actually walking to your car. Not cool, or warm enough in your car yet? Use the Runtime reset to extend your runtime and let it reach the perfect conditions. If anything happens to your vehicle, the security system will notify you right away if you are within range, playing the Revenger siren tones.
feature_bullets: -Way Security + Remote Start System with 5-Button LCD Transmitter
